item.name: MySQL Aborted Clients
item.description: The number of new aborted clients since the last update

item.name: MySQL Aborted Connections
item.description: The number of new aborted connections since the last update

item.name: MySQL New Connections
item.description: The number of new connection attempts, sucessful or not.

item.name: MySQL Ping
item.description: Return 1 if the database is up

item.name: VIP Holder
item.description: Check if host is VIP holder

item.name: Ceph Leader
item.description: True if host is Ceph monitor leader

item.name: Ephemeral device health
item.description: Functional check on ephemeral storage health (RAID 0+LVM VG)

item.name: IP Route: Storage
item.description: Check the ip routes for the storage network are up

trigger.name: Ceph Full
trigger.description: Ceph File system in getting full

trigger.name: Ceph Full
trigger.description: Ceph File system in getting full

trigger.expression: {Template App Ceph Mon:ceph.leader.last()}=1 and {Template App Ceph Mon:ceph.health.str(HEALTH_WARN_non_blocked,#1)}=1
trigger.name: Ceph Health Warn

trigger.expression: {Template App Ceph Mon:ceph.leader.last()}=1 and {Template App Ceph Mon:ceph.health.str(HEALTH_WARN_blocked,#1)}=1
trigger.name: Ceph Health Warn - Blocked Ops
Ceph Health Warn - Blocked Ops
trigger.description: Ceph Reporting health issues - blocked ops

trigger.name: Chef Server Down
trigger.description: One or more Chef Server components are down

trigger.expression: {Template App Ephemeral Node:ephemeral.health.sum(#3)}<-1 or {Template App Ephemeral Node:ephemeral.health.nodata(300)}=1
trigger.name: Ephemeral disk failure
Error reaching local RadosGW instance
trigger.description: Local RadosGW instance did not return HTTP 200

trigger.name: Functional Check Error: RGW
trigger.description: Unable to create/destroy new keys in RGW

trigger.expression: {Template BCPC Compute:system.run[ip route show table mgmt].str(default)}=0
trigger.name: IP Route Check for MGMT failed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template BCPC Compute:system.run[ip route show table storage].str(scope)}=0
trigger.name: IP Route Check for STORAGE failed on {HOST.NAME}
RabbitMQ File Descriptor Usage Exceeds Threshold
VIP jump detected
trigger.description: VIP jump on head node detected
